content.question: In the United States, the federal government redistributes income primarily by

choices.label: setting up planning commissions to set wage rates
taxing different income levels at different rates
guaranteeing every person a minimum income through minimum-wage laws
providing the same goods and services to all citizens
relocating and retraining structurally unemployed people

content.answer: taxing different income levels at different rates
